players.name: Alice
memory: The villager Diana was found dead.
Charlie: "I am the mafioso and I killed Diana last night. Bob, as the detective, has figured this out. Today is my chance to turn the tables on you."
You: "I am not the mafioso. I believe Charlie is lying and Bob might have figured out who the mafioso is."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob

players.name: Bob
memory: The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Charlie: "I am the mafioso and I killed Diana last night. Bob, as the detective, has figured this out. Today is my chance to turn the tables on you."
Alice: "I am not the mafioso. I believe Charlie is lying and Bob might have figured out who the mafioso is."
